review: I recently underwent treatment by Dr. Shahrukh Khan and am incredibly pleased with the experience. From initial consultation through to follow-up appointments, Dr. Shahrukh Khan exhibited outstanding professionalism and compassion. They provided clear explanations of my condition and treatment options, ensuring I felt well-informed and confident in my decisions. Their genuine care and support throughout my recovery were truly comforting. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Shahrukh Khan for their exceptional expertise and dedication to patient well-being.

He is an excellent doctor & a fine surgeon . I consulted him for my mother's recurrent knee and back issues . He will listen to all your problems very patiently and give a good opinion about the diagnosis, treatment options available and prognosis as well . The best part is that he is very humble and approachable. He knows his work really well and his surgical hand is next to perfect.
Highly recommend him . üëç
